name: Window Licker
description:
NB: In case you cannot find the door to leave the window rooms it's in the top left where there's a different brickwork pattern. Maybe it's not obvious enough which is something to look at.

I had an idea for a game called Sonder when doing the short course and wanted to do something with looking into people's windows. I couldn't quite figure out how to do it. I had a discussion with my partner and we came up with the idea of a voyeuristic window washer.  I'd like to flesh this out narrative wise in the future and make it more interesting and engaging but this was my first finished bitsy game so I'm still proud of how it turned out! 

Music: John Carroll Kirby - Phoebe's Theme edited by me

Password: Window Licker
